title: Proficiency Level
description: A collection of topics that define a proficiency level within a proficiency levels list.

id.description: Unique identifier for this proficiency level within its list. Kebab case. Ex: 'my-level-id'

description.description: A brief explanation of this proficiency level. Max 100 characters. (optional)

pretopics.description: List of imported topics required for this proficiency level. Must reference topics from dependencies, not other proficiency levels.
